amendment.description: To reduce funding for home energy performance-based, whole-house rebates and to provide funding for supplemental payments under the payments in lieu of taxes program.

vote.text: Amendment SA 5316 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 49 - 51. Record Vote Number: 305.

action.text: Amendment SA 5316 proposed by Senator Lee to Amendment SA 5194. (consideration: CR S4185-4186; text: CR S4185) To reduce funding for home energy performance-based, whole-house rebates and to provide funding for supplemental payments under the payments in lieu of taxes program.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 5316 proposed by Senator Lee to Amendment SA 5194.
Senate amendment not agreed to: Amendment SA 5316 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 49 - 51. Record Vote Number: 305.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Amendment SA 5316 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 49 - 51. Record Vote Number: 305.
